title: Experience
text:
Researcher
Jun 2023 – Sep 2023

Conducted research in Item Response Theory (IRT), designing an MCMC sampling method tailored to model features, improving efficiency by 50% and reducing data analysis time for 100x100 datasets.

Utilized SQL for data manipulation and R for statistical analysis, increasing the identification of underperforming questions by 20%.

Streamlined exam content improvement through insights into student performance and exam design flaws, presenting findings to non-technical audiences using data visualization tools.

title: Education
text:
Doctor of Philosophy in Statistics
2022 – 2027
Irvine, California, USA

Advisors: Weining Shen and Zhaoxia Yu
Specialized in Item Response Theory, contributing to sampling and testing of response table using nonparametric MCMC sampling methods.
Specialized in Biostatistics, contributing to advancements in Alzheimer’s desease’s early testing using tetramer.
Served as a teaching assistant for undergraduate and graduate courses, mentoring students in data science, biostatistics, probability and statistics.
Awarded technical award, recognizing academic excellence and research contributions.

title: Education
section: University of Science and Technology of China (USTC)
text:
University of Science and Technology of China (USTC)
Bachelor of Science in Mathmatics
2018 – 2022
Hefei, Anhui, China

Gained a strong foundation in mathmatics, statistics and computer science.
Conducted undergraduate research on college students’ acdemic performance investigation, developing skills in data analysis and scientific computing.
Active member of the Student Mathmatics Society, organizing workshops and seminars for peers.

Awarded multiple times, recognizing academic excellence and research contributions.

title: Experience
text:
Cure Alzheimer’s Fund
Researcher
Jun 2024 – Oct 2024

Improved Alzheimer’s biomarker predictive accuracy by 30% through advanced data modeling and machine learning techniques using Python and scikit-learn.

Developed clustering models and conducted exploratory data analysis (EDA) to enhance biomarker identification.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams, integrating Big Data and Cloud Computing tools to produce robust data visualizations and analyses. Presented findings to stakeholders, driving data-driven decision-making.

title: Experience
section: UC Irvine Center for Statistical Consulting
text:
UC Irvine Center for Statistical Consulting
Data Scientist
Apr 2024 – Jun 2024

Analyzed survey data from over 1,000 graduate students to identify key stress factors using Python and R, leading to a 30% improvement in stress factor identification accuracy.

Applied advanced algorithms and predictive modeling techniques, creating actionable insights for stress reduction strategies.

Built interactive dashboards in Tableau and Matplotlib, presenting findings to the UCI Graduate School, and contributing to the development of targeted initiatives.

title: Experience
section: University of Science and Technology of China
text:
University of Science and Technology of China
Project Leader
Jun 2020 – May 2021

Led a 3-member team to enhance production efficiency by 20% through algorithm optimization and data analysis.

Implemented predictive modeling with Python and scikit-learn, reducing waste by 15% and showcasing data-driven decision-making.

Collaborated across teams to design user-oriented software, integrating SQL and Tableau for improved data visualization.

Communicated complex findings to stakeholders with clear visualization and analytics, fostering effective teamwork and decision-making.
